website_summaries.verdict: Bright colors make this dual-purpose silicone potholder and trivet a joy in the kitchen.
pros: Won't mold, mildew, stain or absorb odors
cons: Some find too bulky to use as pot holders

customer_reviews.title: Conducts heat readily, messed up the surface it was supposed to protect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect much from a hot pad, keep me from burning myself when I touch something hot with it. Keep surfaces below a hot pad from damage. So far heat has conducted right through and burnt me, and today I noticed a distinctive honeycomb pattern in my butcher block kitchen table, the hot pad melted in and messed up the lacquer something no other hotpad has done, scraping it off now but distinctly not happy. Going back to cloth hot pads.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Makeup brush cleaning surface
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these for their intended use. This review is not for that. Someone else will have to review for that. My daughters and I use them to clean our makeup brushes. The honeycomb surface gives just enough 'scrub' to get our makeup brushes clean quickly. A squirt of dishsoap, a quick scrub on the surface, a rinse...and done.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.text: These silicone pot holders are an excellent product to add to your kitchen. They are brightly colored, which makes them easy to find in a drawer or closet. They are thick enough to show a quality construction. I was very impressed with the grip they give you, and how well they handle the heat of a pot or pan. I think the size is exact correct for most uses, and find them very convenient. You can't go wrong with these additions to your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stev W.

customer_reviews.title: The price was good especially compared to local stores and if you get ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean as far as pot holders go these are amongst the elite. I am a chef and have used my share of potholders. They are big enough to cover my hand as a I grab hot pans and dishes from the oven, but they also help my hot serving dishes to not slide around all over my counter. The price was good especially compared to local stores and if you get them damp you won’t be burning your hands. As an added bonus the colors are vibrant and brighten up my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses - wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: better than cloth pot holders because if they get food on them they can be washed and dried on the spot - no waiting for laundry - and they don't stain. Also, I'm using one as a cushion for my bench block for work on jewelry. Does the job very nicely. They work under a cutting board to make it non-skid too. Many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Terri DelCampo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot Holders, Trivets, & Jar Lid Opener.
customer_reviews.text: The pot holders are just the right size and thickness. They are thick enough to handle hat dishes and thin enough to work well as a jar lid opener. The price is great for 4 pot holders. They work great as a trivet. They are great for so many uses. They even have a hole so you can hang them on a hook. The colors are great. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: WASHABLE hot pads
customer_reviews.text: I like these!! Great washable hot pads for the table. I still like my big soft thick cloth mitts for taking things in and out of the oven. but these have a great texture (I'm a potter and am always looking for such things :) and they look so much better than my gross stained hot pads. I REALLY like the clamshell ones also for taking things out of the microwave and holding those hot chicken legs to see if they move and to grab hot bits when carving.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The size is great for handling larger size pots and protecting the counter. I use them with my cast iron cookware, though I do double them up because of the heat retention properties of cast iron. Would I order these again? Absolutely!. That’s my plan.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma’s Goodies

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS. Don't use them as pot holders!
customer_reviews.text: OK as a trivet or as pads to keep mixing bowls from slipping around, but as pot holders they're really dangerous. If your pan/pot is heavy, it will compress the silicone so you're technically only holding the pan with the thinnest part of the "waffle" texture. I've burned myself twice using these and now only use them as trivets and such.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all my cooking/baking needs
customer_reviews.text: These silicone pot holders have been great for my cooking and baking needs. I can use them to set hot pots and pans down on my counters and table without the heat transferring and ruining the surfaces. I also love that the little honeycomb design inside of the holders act as little suction grippers so the heavy casserole pans I remove from the oven have better grip in handling them than with cloth oven mitts. I can lay all four square pot holders out and make a bigger surface area to place my hot dishes on, these have been universal and easy to use and clean if anything should spill on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ardena

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: They work in the hottest of ovens, i used them at 550. I use them for light scrubbing. Also to sit a hot dish on wood. I am happy. The hex pattern holds water in the wash so cleaning is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Glaron

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't take too much space and can really be a life-saver to keep things from burning your hands. I bought and used the cheaper ones from the dollar store and though they work, it's not as useful as this. The heat resistance is great and grease can be washed off easily. It can be used to take things from the oven without feeling too much heat on your hands. The colors are nice and my wife approves it. It's one of those things where you don't think you'll need it but always end up using it.
customer_reviews.author: MasterSushi

customer_reviews.title: NOT as heat-resistant as claimed
customer_reviews.text: The hot pads are flexible and easy to use. BUT their heat-resistance is extremely limited. I took cookie sheets out of a 350-degree oven and after 5 seconds I had to set the pan down because the heat bled through the silicone and was starting to burn my fingers. The same heat in the same few seconds happened the next time. They are serviceable, but fall quite short of the product description. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Loweecey

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but a little too bulky for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these much as pot holders. They are a little too stiff and bulky for me. On the plus side, they are well made, great for placing hot dishes or platters on right out of the microwave or oven, and they clean up great right in the dishwasher. It's not a matter of function but of preference. See for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Madison

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!  DOES NOT WORK!!N
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! These potholders do not work. Do Not Buy These. You will get injured as they are too thin and will transfer whatever it is hot you are holding dorectly to you hands. I have no idea why these are so highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Zeck Koa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product; sad and strange that seller reimbursed me
customer_reviews.text: Silicon pot holders are a great concept and I see this product as a very nicely made example. The Amazon product review system needs to be rethunk, though. Seriously. I received an offer I couldn't resist: seller reimbursed me the full price plus tax of this product. They asked me to post a review. I very much wish reviews weren't incentivised and would be more trustable and independent. I'm pretty independent myself regardless but I'm sure that many folks that get these sorts of offers are not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They hold good grip to the items placed on top
customer_reviews.text: These trives are stable and thick enough to protect table top from heat. They hold good grip to the items placed on top. Very practical and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W

customer_reviews.title: Slippery.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like these at all. They're too thin and slippery. Always feels like things are going to slip out of the holders and onto the floor while I'm moving them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazorro

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value. Love the colors as well. Bought a couple backs and they have come in handy for past gatherings and putting out hot dishes. Usually use gloves to take things in and out of the oven, but love that in a pinch, these are flexible and can be used in their place. Definitely recommend, especially if these fit your color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: No more burn skin because of hot pots
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on impulse, but ended up becomes very useful in the kitchen. I use this as a mitt, a pot holder and also cover for my smaller pot since its mad with silicone. The flexibility makes it easy to grip different pot shapes, and it’s quite thic
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah Bowo

customer_reviews.title: Pot holders
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Only reason I gave 4 star for heat was I found some heat getting through taking a toaster oven tray out that was very hot. Probably better to use a real pot holder in that situation. But as for jar lid removal, spoon rest, ease of use and working with something hot for a short period of time these are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible for taking things out of the oven. Heat goes right through them and you will burn your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not very useful
customer_reviews.text: They’re not great. The waffle texture means, when you pick up a hot pot, there is very little protection everywhere there’s an indent. I now use two, which is not very secure. They’re pretty, but not that useful.
customer_reviews.author: kskinct

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery.
customer_reviews.text: You need a firm grip when you use these as oven mitts, or your casserole dish is going to slip right out of your hands. But be careful not to squeeze too hard – – that will defeat the ridges, and get your fingers closer to the heat. But they are beautiful and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Murray

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, straight up, I didn't think I'd use these as much as I do. They come in very handy as trivets as well. The texture and grip these things have are quite nice and they don't reek like the ones I've encountered before did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really a 4.6
customer_reviews.text: Would actually give this a 4.6 because the pads are just a little too thick. Because of their thickness, it can be difficult to grab smaller objects. While reducing the thickness of the pads just a little, and thereby reducing their protective ability by a few degrees, I believe that the pads would be plenty safe enough at up to 400 degrees for most purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Better than some other silicone pot holders
customer_reviews.text: This set of silicone pot holders is thicker than another brand I had purchased earlier, so it offers more protection from heat.
customer_reviews.author: C2C

customer_reviews.title: you gotta be quick. cant really hold hot items ...
customer_reviews.text: you gotta be quick. cant really hold hot items for too long...you will notice it. that being said, we still use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: I like turtles

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick silicone pot holder
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick silicone pot holder. I have seen much thinner ones. The material, thin or thick - to me is a bit bulky;they're like an oven mitt. If you want to set something hot on them, there are enough to double up. A single layer works for me and they are pretty. Have to watch for the hole in the holder. I use them for larger items, hot handles and to set things on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace my traditional pot holders & boy am I glad I did! These are big enough to handle any pot handle & very flexible. Bigger in size than my old potholders. Great investment for a small price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These pot holders are not heat resistant as advertised. We just received them and used them for the first time to take muffins out of a 350 degree oven. My husband almost burned his hands and then had to double them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Look and work great. Only gave them 4 stars instead of 5 as they are a lot thicker than my old ones, with the thinner ones being my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat gets through
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for a quick removal from the oven to pop on a counter. But, if you need to hold a hot dish longer than a few seconds, these are not for you. I burned my hand moving a dish from the oven to the counter behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Preciouspups

customer_reviews.title: Nice holders but they don't fully protect the surface from ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice holders but they don't fully protect the surface from the heat. After having set down a hot pot onto one of these for dinner, the table felt hot to the touch afterwards. I tend to double them up now to minimize this.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Square in a good way; beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are lovely, and the fact that they are square means you can set them together for larger items to rest upon.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Helping Hand
customer_reviews.text: These work great for helping to hold something (a bowl or plate) in place; non-skid grip and soft enough to also prevent scratching surfaces I have even used them to hold a slice of bread while applying peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: These work great.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have to worry so much about them catching fire if sitting a little too close to the gas stove top ;)
customer_reviews.author: S. Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: These are light and flexible and should work great for the cast iron pizza pan that I plan to use camping with my new Biolite stove. Hopefully the waffle design is protective enough.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: These really did the job, but I’ll still probably purchase traditional pot holders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this set of pot holders :)
customer_reviews.text: I found a similar-hexagonal shaped pot holder (it was the last one in stock) in a grocery store a while back and was very happy with it and was looking for some more of the same. These are square, but otherwise seem to be the same type of pattern and material, and like the other, has a hole for easy hanging from a hook. I paid about $4-$5 for the single item at the grocery store and this set includes 4 potholders for roughly $10.00, so it's a good deal too. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SteveOTheShopperO

customer_reviews.title: Dual Purpose Pot Holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for camping ⛺️ because they are compact and can be used as trivets as well. As soon as I put them to the test I will come back to finish the review!
customer_reviews.author: Victa

customer_reviews.title: Save your hands from heat...
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the kitchen. These potholders provide enough thickness to safely transport pots and bowls from heated area to counter while providing firm grip due to it's ability to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good for cool electronics too.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a hot pot to put on this. The central console of my car is made of hard plastic. My phone slip on that and was scratched. I bought these pad to protect my phone. Works better (and cheaper) than those "sticky car console mat"
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are great for hot dood but are pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: angel200168

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I asked for
customer_reviews.text: I like the heat resistance and flexibility; good size, pretty colors
customer_reviews.author: Patti Leib

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: these are very reliable and sleek. i like to hold my hot trays with them because they don't burn my hands!! best for cookies that you can share
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and useful. We use them for hot pads, pot holders and to open tight jar covers. Very pleased with the product and have sent them as presents to several people.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Conant

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: Have several in the camper. Like that these are multiple use. We used as trivet, pot holders, and used to get a stuck lid off a jar. Quick rinse to clean. Light weight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: A. NicMert

customer_reviews.title: The design of these silicone pot holders is far superior to any I've previously used
customer_reviews.text: The design of these silicone pot holders is far superior to any I've previously used. The honeycomb design assures there are no thin spots that come in contact with the hot pan. The pot holders are very flexible making them easy to manage. Overall excellent form and function.
customer_reviews.author: K Nosay

customer_reviews.title: These work really well!
customer_reviews.text: Good grip. Grabs pans and hot oven racks easily. Pleasing to look at in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SherryB

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick silicon trivets
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a whole lot to say about these, which is a good thing. They are nice and thick silicon mats which work just as you'd expect. The quality seems good and they are thick enough that I wouldn't worry about them tearing. Good product at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome...work great...would definitely purchase again as needed and for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: JKOK

customer_reviews.title: I use these all the time and they work great. I would have preferred to have a package ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time and they work great. I would have preferred to have a package of 4 blue ones, as that goes better with my kitchen. Green doesnt, but I can always give those away if I dont like them.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase today.
customer_reviews.text: No more ratty old pot holders, plus I use them for opening my pickle jar. Top rack dish washer safe. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jandar

customer_reviews.title: They really keep the heat out of objects straight from the oven.
customer_reviews.text: We use them to stop items slipping on tray etc.
customer_reviews.author: william howard

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to worry about them burning or heating through like cloth pot holders
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and exactly what I was looking for. I don't have to worry about them burning or heating through like cloth pot holders. They double as trivets and can be used to open jars, etc. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick hot pads. They do work well using them for multiple uses. Great for picking up hot pans from oven, or using to open a tough jar lid or as a trivet. Are definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ailina 25

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely live  them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Th colors are bright and cheery, they work great for the tops of my pots that are metal, and they are flexible enough to use without any difficulty! They have no plastcy smell and are very heat resistant! I love that they are food grade silicone as well! The price is also very reasonable! Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer491

customer_reviews.title: Finally got mom to replace some of her old worn ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got mom to replace some of her old worn out pot holders with these. She resisted at first, but now uses these daily and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Oklizhoma

customer_reviews.title: ... we thought they would be however it was a good thing. We're excited to use these
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than we thought they would be however it was a good thing. We're excited to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is a really innovative product, being able to use this a replacement for oven mitts is really why I bought it but its really good to use it like a holder to prevent the table to get dirty
customer_reviews.author: Arjit

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely heat proof, but just a bit stiff, hard sometimes to grip small pans out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: penelope misner

customer_reviews.title: jar
customer_reviews.text: Silicone products work great and we use these to separate non stick pans, etc. until we need them for trivets or opening jars. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M squared

customer_reviews.title: Holds up pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times already, and it help up really good on a hot bowl. Make sure you let the silicone pads air out for a day prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: JYL

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for fabric pot holders
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace fabric pot holders. So much easier to clean. Very versatile
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Hoing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these as a non-slip base for my cutting board and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but I guess I got what I paid for. They are cheaper than the usual ones I buy. However, when my fingers get hot just taking it from the oven to my counter they aren't worth using.
customer_reviews.author: s morgan

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them for use with my epoxy risen crafts
customer_reviews.author: Yvette B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to clean and still sturdy. I usually use it to hold the hot dishes and It's really heat resistant
customer_reviews.author: Oujin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pot holders. Very durable and useful in my kitchen. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: just wish they were a little smaller A little stiff when trying to get a hold of pan
customer_reviews.author: Need to Know

customer_reviews.title: great product. Wish it were a bit easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. Wish it were a bit easier to clean but its 100 times better than cloth pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: GSA913

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly. I use them for secure padding under ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. I use them for secure padding under my cutting boards, so I haven't seen them since they arrived, but I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as advertised. Had them about a week so far.
customer_reviews.text: These have been super useful so far. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Struble

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product with removing hot containers from microwave. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: fantastic, flexible use and love colors!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, flexible yet durable. Love the colors, I have them on every counter top for my tea carafe, coffee spoon holder and pad for utensils I use to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: holds on to water
customer_reviews.text: Once you rinse them, with all the honeycombs, the water just sets in and never seems to dry out. These are awful.
customer_reviews.author: M Noreen

customer_reviews.title: They work good to set on the table
customer_reviews.text: They work good to set on the table , but to just grab hot dishes out of oven too slippery .
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to spread peanut butter on for my dog serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Yitz

customer_reviews.title: Potholder and/or Trivet
customer_reviews.text: Thin and flexible so they can be used as potholders as well as trivets.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these, though could feel the heat through them on my first try. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: BRP

customer_reviews.title: I love that I don't have to worry about fabric potholders ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't have to worry about fabric potholders getting damp and steaming my fingers anymore. Definitely need one in each hand but at least I'm not burning myself anymore with the crappy design of the racks in my oven.
customer_reviews.author: bridgette

customer_reviews.title: No way!
customer_reviews.text: Burned my hands first time I used! Am using them now as furniture pads to protect the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Look attractive, work fine - both as trivet and potholder
customer_reviews.author: GibyJ

customer_reviews.title: Never burn yourself again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worked in kitchens for years and I’ve tried many products that help hold hot pots and pans these are the best. I keep a set at home and a set in my chef bag
customer_reviews.author: Slava Vakser

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Use them as pot holders and to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Use them as pot holders and to sit hot pots and pans on.
customer_reviews.author: tarheel

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these are well made and work so great. I tried some and loved them so much I got them for a friend for a wedding gift
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size! I just wish they came in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean and work well
customer_reviews.text: Work well and are very easy to keep clean. They don't require a trip to laundry room like to old pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great to use in Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Love it as pot holders and trivets! Tried to use it for chocolate chips but too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice. Not as thick as the ones I bought at meijers. But they should do fine.
customer_reviews.author: kymwyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great pot holders
customer_reviews.text: Easy to flex to grip items out of the oven. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Borgmann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip large items from oven with no heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grip large items from oven with no heat coming through the pot holders. Easy to clean, good to use as a hot pad and dish does not slip off. Difficult to pick up small items from microwave or oven due to the thickness of the holders, but that's not a significant problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Pot holders
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick. Good quality. We use to protect finish on nonstick pans when we stack them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sev

customer_reviews.title: Heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: We tried to find these locally but the reasonable price made it easy to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Littrell from Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to grip and clean and keep your hand from getting scalded. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Babbs McLemore

customer_reviews.title: Thin is good!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! I bought them to replace bulky cloth pads. They work great and stow away in drawer better than thick cloth pads.
customer_reviews.author: Allan F. Eddy

customer_reviews.title: then it's a fun treat for them to lick for a while
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as frozen treat mats for my dogs. I smear peanut butter or yogurt over the surface, freeze it, then it's a fun treat for them to lick for a while. 10/10 works great for what I bought them for!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These potholders are perfect for me. They clean up very well and hold hot pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: rwojtyna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, colors alright. Perfect for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Baby-gamma

product_meta.title: Silicone Pot Holders Set of 4 Ankway Silicone Trivets Multi-Purpose Hot Pads Heat Resistant to 450 °F, Non-slip Coasters, Insulation, Durable Flexible Trivet for Table Kitchen Countertop, Blue & Green
feature_bullets: 【SUPER FOOD-GRADE SILICONE】This food-grade, flexible enough, non-slip, honeycomb design silicone material won't stain, mold, mildew, or absorb odors. Safe to use in the kitchen and will not change the color or taste of food it touches. Perefect to hold the hot items and also protect the tables from the hot steam produced by cookware.

【MULTI-PURPOSE & SAFELY】Our silicone trivets are soft, non-slip, BPA free, flexible & strong enough to comfortably grab a hot dish, hot pot or hot pans safely. Multi-purpose use as pot holder, trivet, large coaster, jar opener, spoon rest, cup mat, camping, dish drying mat, counter mat or anywhere you need extra grip or exteme heat or cold protection. Can clean your makeup brushes as well.

【450°F HEAT RESISTANT HOT PADS】 Insulation performance, heat resistant to 450°F, perfect for use in an oven, microwave. As a protector for countertop, table, stove,oven or others. Double as coasters for hot pots and pans.

【DURABLE, FLEXIBLE & EASY TO CLEAN】 Does the job of bending and flexing as you need it, so can avoid dunking it into your food. Just rinse or hand wash or dishwasher when it needs to be cleaned. Easily roll it up or hang on hook.

【100% SATISFACTION SERVICE】2pcs bule & 2pcs green potholders, 7.28"*7.28"*0.23". Using only the best materials, we create top of the line kitchen tools that are made to last. No-hassle free-replacement service..
